attributes.review: The interface of the app was truly terrible. You can’t find anything on there that’s useful. There were way too many pop up adds for butt cream and I swear this gave my phone a virus.
attributes.title: Absolute garbage

attributes.review: it literally took forever to download & as soon as it did , the app kicked me out again !! i have great wifi & phenomenal cell service but it wouldn’t work for like the first 36 hours 😫 once it finally started working , it glitched and played “shawty’s like a melody” over & over again 🤭 it wouldn’t even finish the song 😡😡😡 it was just “shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody shawty’s like a melody ... “ ugh 🙄 0/1000000 would never recommend
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP 😡

attributes.review: ✨🧚🏼‍♀️I wanted to download this app so i could show our big orange rat some love.  as soon  as i download the app it immediately started glitching. i looked beside me to find trump staring at me through my window. as soon as we locked eyes, my house bursted into flames and he held me and my family hostage until i kicked him in his little bitty sausage that he calls a dick. then i threw him in a fire and me and my cockroaches and fellow rats danced around the fire in front of the white house and ate cookies that looked exactly like tide pods and then dropped dead for five minutes and then raided the white house bc NOBODY gives a RATS A** about trump🧚🏼‍♀️✨

attributes.review: Let’s talk about how bad this app was, it took 12 hours to download. Once I got into this app is glitched and showed this weird orange Cheeto thing on my screen. Oh wait it was you! 💅🏽💅🏽 I just wanted to support my president that mad America worse by getting this app. I support him so much that I decided to buy some tickets, but my talking lizard reminded be that it wants to go to Disney World today. We couldn’t because we had a lousy president that doesn’t know how to take care of this country properly and now so many people are dying because “If you don’t test for Covid, there won’t be any cases.” Anyways I just want to say, and Gen-Z with take over. You won’t win Mr.Cheeto dust. Trump 2020💫✨💅🏽In a circus💅🏽💫✨
